visuals.clothing: Blue overalls with a red striped shirt
visuals.other_features: Medium-long black hair, medium skin tone

visuals.appearance: A sleek, silver robot with glowing blue eyes
visuals.other_features: Various buttons and lights on its metallic body

image_prompts.prompt_img_00: Create an engaging, whimsical cartoon-style book cover image featuring an 8-year-old boy named Jay with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone. He is dressed in blue overalls with a red striped shirt, smiling warmly beside his companion, Nailer, a sleek silver robot with glowing blue eyes, and various buttons and lights on its metallic body. They are standing in front of an adventure-filled park with a backdrop of blue sky and fluffy clouds, hinting at the exciting adventures within the pages.
image_prompts.prompt_img_01: Generate a colorful and whimsical cartoon-style image of Jay, the 8-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, wearing blue overalls and a red striped shirt, as he eagerly unboxes his new companion, Nailer. Nailer the robot is partially visible inside the box, his glowing blue eyes just coming to life amidst the unwrapping, with cartoon hearts around Jay to show his immediate love for Nailer.
image_prompts.prompt_img_02: Construct a joyful and vibrant cartoon-style image of Jay, the 8-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, teaching his companion Nailer how to play catch in a sunny backyard. Jay is wearing blue overalls with a red striped shirt and is in a playful stance, while Nailer, the sleek silver robot with glowing blue eyes, is clumsily trying to catch a red ball.
image_prompts.prompt_img_03: Illustrate a cute and heartwarming cartoon-style image with Jay, the happy 8-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, sitting cross-legged in his room. He\'s wearing blue overalls and a red striped shirt while reading a storybook to Nailer, the fascinated silver robot with glowing blue eyes who is attentively listening and learning.
image_prompts.prompt_img_04: Create a whimsical cartoon-style image of Jay, the 8-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, looking surprised as he and Nailer the robot discover a hidden garden. Jay, in his blue overalls and red striped shirt, and Nailer, the glowing-eyed silver robot, stand at the entrance, their expressions filled with wonder and excitement.
image_prompts.prompt_img_05: Generate an imaginative and vibrant cartoon-style image depicting Jay, the 8-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, and his companion Nailer trying to solve a mysterious riddle they found in the hidden garden. Both are thinking hard, with question marks above their heads, while Jay points to a clue on a stone tablet and Nailer analyzes it with a magnifying glass.
image_prompts.prompt_img_06: Construct a dynamic and fun cartoon-style image of Jay, the 8-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, wearing blue overalls and a red striped shirt, as he races Nailer the silver robot through a maze of hedges. Both characters show determination and glee on their faces as they navigate the green labyrinth.
image_prompts.prompt_img_07: Illustrate a tender and touching cartoon-style image where Jay, the 8-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, gently fixes a small scratch on Nailer\'s metallic arm. Jay, focused and caring in his blue overalls and red striped shirt, applies a band-aid with a robot design on it, while Nailer looks on with affectionate glowing blue eyes.
image_prompts.prompt_img_08: Create a heartwarming and cheerful cartoon-style image of Jay, the 8-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, teaching Nailer how to bake cookies in a cozy kitchen. Jay, wearing blue overalls and a red striped shirt, is laughing as Nailer, the robot with glowing blue eyes, attempts to roll out dough with his robotic hands.
image_prompts.prompt_img_09: Generate an inspiring and playful cartoon-style image of Jay, the 8-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, showing Nailer the robot the beauty of a sunset from atop a hill. Both characters are silhouetted against an orange-pink sky, with Jay pointing out at the horizon and Nailer\'s blue eyes reflecting the warm colors of the sun setting.
image_prompts.prompt_img_10: Construct an emotional and serene cartoon-style image of Jay and Nailer, sitting beside a campfire under the starry night sky. Jay, the 8-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, is wrapped in a blanket over his blue overalls and red striped shirt, sharing stories with Nailer, who is mesmerized by the flickering flames reflecting in his glowing blue eyes.
image_prompts.prompt_img_11: Illustrate a delightful and peaceful cartoon-style image of Jay, the 8-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, and Nailer quietly watching from their tent as dawn breaks. Both friends, wrapped in warm blankets, gaze out at the awakening world, Jay wearing his blue overalls and red striped shirt, while Nailer\'s glowing blue eyes shimmer with the new day\'s light.
